home.title: Welcome
home.description: This is a place to showcase my projects and introductions.

about.title: Full Stack Engineer • Espresso Enthusiast
about.content: Full-stack engineer with 5 years of experience building modern web applications

description.part1: I’m a full-stack engineer with five years of experience and have completed several projects so far. Although I specialize in full-stack development, I have a strong preference for front-end visual and interactive design. In the future, I hope to broaden my technical expertise to areas such as DevOps.
description.part2: Outside of work, I enjoy traveling and photography, as well as playing video games. One day, I hope to create a game of my own.

switcher.aria: Switch between light and dark themes
